Tutorials

This part present different tutorials in order to exemplify how versatile Metaheuristics.jl is.

Options

Comparing Algorithms

Assume that you want to optimize the following function:

\[ f(x) = 10n + \sum_{i=1}^n x_i^n - 10\cos(2\pi x_i)\]

where $x \in [-10, 10]^n$ and $n = 10$.
